CustomField.formula: IF((ISPICKVAL(Charge_Bucket_1__c, 'Agreement Value')),Charge_Bucket_1_Amount__c / Unit__r.Saleable_Area__c, IF((ISPICKVAL(Charge_Bucket_2__c, 'Agreement Value')),Charge_Bucket_2_Amount__c / Unit__r.Saleable_Area__c, IF((ISPICKVAL(Charge_Bucket_3__c, 'Agreement Value')),Charge_Bucket_3_Amount__c / Unit__r.Saleable_Area__c, IF((ISPICKVAL(Charge_Bucket_4__c, 'Agreement Value')),Charge_Bucket_4_Amount__c / Unit__r.Saleable_Area__c, IF((ISPICKVAL(Charge_Bucket_5__c, 'Agreement Value')),Charge_Bucket_5_Amount__c / Unit__r.Saleable_Area__c,0)))))
CustomField.label: Modified AV Rate
